document.full_text: president barack obama warned americans on sunday night to remain vigilant even after the killing of al qaeda leader osama bin laden and while there are no known credible threats, the risk of attacks remains.
document.title: threat remains after bin laden killed by u.s. forces
lines_and_colors: president barack obama warned americans on sunday night to remain vigilant even after the killing of al qaeda leader osama bin laden and while there are no known credible threats, the risk of attacks remains.
